de oeikolom krijgt -> u : 1
oeikolom krijgt u -> lekker : 1
krijgt u lekker -> ga : 1
u lekker ga -> zo : 1
lekker ga zo -> door : 1
ga zo door -> en : 1
zo door en -> hou : 1
door en hou -> die : 1
en hou die -> adviseurs : 1
hou die adviseurs -> buiten : 1
die adviseurs buiten -> de : 1
adviseurs buiten de -> er : 1
buiten de er -> is : 1
er is zeker -> nog : 1
is zeker nog -> maar : 1
zeker nog maar -> actie : 1
nog maar actie -> is : 1
maar actie is -> uw : 1
actie is uw -> organisatie : 1
is uw organisatie -> verkeert : 1
uw organisatie verkeert -> in : 1
organisatie verkeert in -> staat : 1
verkeert in staat -> van : 1
in staat van -> based : 1
staat van based -> key : 1
van based key -> performance : 1
based key performance -> process : 1
key performance process -> process : 1
performance process process -> desk : 1
process process desk -> identity : 1
process desk identity -> loyalty : 1
desk identity loyalty -> relationship : 1
identity loyalty relationship -> digit : 1
loyalty relationship digit -> branding : 1
relationship digit branding -> based : 1
digit branding based -> innovation : 1
branding based innovation -> performance : 1
based innovation performance -> potential : 1
innovation performance potential -> resource : 1
performance potential resource -> performance : 1
potential resource performance -> six : 1
resource performance six -> sigma : 1
performance six sigma -> black : 1
six sigma black -> verantwoord : 1
sigma black verantwoord -> by : 1
black verantwoord by -> by : 1
verantwoord by by -> by : 1
by by by -> by : 2
by by by -> walking : 1
by by walking -> entry : 1
by walking entry -> brand : 1
walking entry brand -> public : 1
entry brand public -> brand : 1
brand public brand -> profile : 1
public brand profile -> business : 1
brand profile business -> media : 1
profile business media -> of : 1
business media of -> chain : 1
media of chain -> quality : 1
of chain quality -> selling : 1
chain quality selling -> based : 1
quality selling based -> brand : 1
selling based brand -> guardian : 1
based brand guardian -> brand : 1
